alert.note: Alert for Coahoma (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:34AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Phillips and west central Coahoma Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 333 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Holly Grove to near St. Charles to near Merrisach Lake to near Pea Ridge. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marvell, Elaine, White River National Wildlife Refuge, Helena-West Helena, Lexa, Sherard, Crumrod, Watkins Corner, Lake View, Rena Lara, Mosby Spur, Ferguson, Wabash, Modoc, Hoop Spur, Wycamp, Latour, Ratio, Lundell and Ewal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
